name: Stencil Runner
description:
Stencil Runner

"Stencil Runner" is a Jump'n'Run Game, where you slip in the role of Cromi, a Graffiti Character stenciled with a spraycan on a Wall. The natural environment on and around the wall are the obstacles, Cromi has to pass on his way. Spread your Tag and bomb the wall. But do not get seen by the real people passing by.

Controls
  • ArrowKeys - Move
  • Space - Jump, DoubleJump
Team
  • Grigory Gusev - Game Design, Character Design, Game Programing
  • Kleo Kreitz - Level Design
